select m.mbti_seq, m.name, m.result, m.mbti_img, m.attraction_seq, m.course_seq, a.name AS attraction_name, MAX(ai.img) AS attraction_img, c.name AS course_name, c.img AS course_img from tblMBTI m join tblAttraction a on m.attraction_seq = a.attraction_seq join tblAttractionImg ai on a.attraction_seq = ai.attraction_seq join tblCourse c on m.course_seq = c.course_seq where mbti_seq = #{mbti_seq} group by m.mbti_seq, m.name, m.result, m.mbti_img, m.attraction_seq, m.course_seq, a.name, c.name, c.img order by mbti_seq
mapper.insert: insert into tblMBTI (mbti_seq, result, name, mbti_img, course_seq, attraction_seq) values (seqtblMBTI.NEXTVAL, #{result}, #{name}, #{mbti_img}, #{course_seq}, #{attraction_seq})
mapper.select: select count(*) from tblMBTI where name = #{name}
mapper.update: update tblMBTI set result = #{result}, name = #{name}, mbti_img = #{mbti_img}, attraction_seq = #{attraction_seq}, course_seq = #{course_seq} where mbti_seq = #{mbti_seq}
